## Digital Scaling Philosophy

**CRITICAL:** All components output platform-agnostic digital codes!
- Components: Output `signed(15 downto 0)` digital values
- Platform: Maps digital → voltage via DAC configuration
- **Read:** docs/DIGITAL_SCALING_PHILOSOPHY.md

## Core Components

**Utilities:**
- forge_util_clk_divider - Clock division
- forge_hierarchical_encoder - Digital state encoding (200 units/state)

**Voltage Packages (Conversion Utilities Only):**
- forge_voltage_3v3_pkg - 0-3.3V conversions (testing/sim)
- forge_voltage_5v0_pkg - 0-5V conversions (testing/sim)
- forge_voltage_5v_bipolar_pkg - ±5V conversions (testing/sim)

**NOTE:** Voltage packages are NOT for component logic!

**Testing:**
- P1: 2-4 tests, <20 lines output
- P2: 5-10 tests, <50 lines output
- P3: 15-25 tests, <100 lines output
